title: Pregnant Lydia Bright and Lucy Mecklenburgh enjoy 'Besties Babymoon'
text:
They are due to give birth just five days apart from each other.

And pregnant Lydia Bright and Lucy Mecklenburgh are certainly enjoying their matching pregnancies as they have headed to Corfu for a Besties Babymoon.

The duo, who are also joined by Montana Brown, Ashley James and Charlotte de Carle on the trip, posed in matching swimwear while larking around on a boat.

Miaow! Pregnant Lydia Bright and Lucy Mecklenburgh are certainly enjoying their matching pregnancies as they have headed to Corfu for a Besties Babymoon

Lucy and Lydia were proudly displaying their matching bumps during the fun-filled journey, where Ashley was acting as photographer for the ladies.

While Ashley was sharing clips of her fellow holidaymakers, she also posted a duo of snaps of herself while discussing retouching photos.

Only recently, Lydia, who is expecting a girl, revealed to Closer magazine that she is planning for Lucy's little boy to marry her daughter - although she mused that they may wind up more like cousins.

Earlier this month, Lucy shared a video of the moment she and her fiancé Ryan Thomas discovered the sex of the baby as she looked overjoyed at the news.

Stunning: The duo, who are also joined by Montana Brown, Ashley James and Charlotte de Carle on the trip, posed in matching swimwear while larking around on a boat

Lucy took to Instagram on the evening of her 28th birthday in August to announce she is expecting her first child with Ryan and debuted her blossoming baby bump in a figure-hugging red dress.

The ex Corrie star gifted Lucy a baby grow, which they held up for the snap as they revealed that they are set to welcome their first baby together, two months after he proposed during a romantic trip to Italy, following two years of dating.

Alongside the heartwarming shot, the reality star wrote: Best birthday present 'I've ever had. Love you @ryanthomas84,' with a baby emoji and a heart emoji included in the caption.

Mothers-to-be: The two former TOWIE stars, who are both 20 weeks pregnant, took to their Instagram accounts on Wednesday to share several updates about the idyllic getaway

Holiday time: Lydia, 29, posted a sweet video of herself and Lucy, 28, showcasing their blossoming baby bumps in summer dresses as they walked hand-in-hand to a luxury yacht

Ryan also raises daughter Scarlett with his ex-girlfriend and former Coronation Street co-star Tina O'Brien, 36, who he was in a relationship with for six years.

Lydia announced in August that she was expecting her first child, a daughter, with her ex-boyfriend Lee Cronin in February next year.

While Lydia is pleased to become a first-time mother, the pregnant star confirmed she split from her long-term partner Lee after being in a relationship for more than two years.

The couple first briefly parted ways in January with Lydia confirming they had split for good in August.
